item.description:
Come and celebrate our 100th Brunch And More meetup!!!

By request and with very high praise.

A new kind of lounge. Avant-garde boutique, with cult high-concept clothing mingling in translucent boxes, shares a stylish Fort Point Channel space with Persephone restaurant.

This place combines: boutique shopping, organic food and a full bar and lounge. You can also play video games or watch movies.

Come experience the city's newest lounge concept in Men's Accessories and Women's Clothing.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Can you believe Our 100th Brunch And More meetup is at the Achilles Project !!!
